name: RUSSIAPHOBIA
description:
RUSSIAPHOBIA is a Unique opportunity to Immerse Yourself in Russian Realities as a Foreign Agent and Help Presidents Make Russia Great Again!
Unique Features
World Government - the Most Influential People of the World are Waiting for You, Listen to the Briefing and Proceed to the Mission
Cooperative Multiplayer - Go Exploring Russia as Secret Agents with your Friends
Russian Clean Up - Dispose of all the Feces
Don't get Caught by the Russians - They Don't like Strangers
Help your Country - Return the Money Bags and New Year Gifts stolen from the Budget
Get the secret Data Carriers - Find all the Flash Drives and Send them to the Court
Russia is Waiting for You and Your Friends!
All characters and events appearing in this work are fictitious. Any resemblance to real persons, living or dead, or events is purely coincidental. The game does not have the goal of insulting or humiliating anyone.
